about_description: Our 5m bell tent is the perfect choice for festivals, or family getaways. The tent comfortably fits from 4 to 8 people (depending on sleeping choice) and offers a spacious, cozy atmosphere. Made from high-quality, water-resistant canvas, it keeps you dry and comfortable in any weather. You can choose full service with setup and takedown included, or rent the tent only if you prefer to handle it yourself. Whether youâ€™re planning a stylish glamping experience or extra space for your event, our bell tent is a unique and reliable option.
